name: Tweetfairy
description:
Help the fairy on her ritual to win more glamour or get in her way.

Playing Tweetfairy is as simple as using the arrow keys to move left and right. You should tell your friends to mention #tweetfairygame on Twitter with the hashtags #tfatk, #tfheal, and #tfbuff, because their tweets will show up inside the game.

Made by @Rumpelcita and @Eamanelf.

Powered by Phaser.io
